GE07bhg4c12u:200: tathāi tatrānanda-mūrter mama sphuraṇān na kleśatayā vibhāti /
GE07bhg4c12u:202: hi yasmād avyaktā gatir avyaktākṣara-viṣayā mano-vṛttir dehavadbhir dehābhimānibhir janair duḥkhaṃ yathā syāt tathāvāpyate /
GE07bhg4c12u:203: dehavantaḥ khalu sthūla-deham eva sucirād ātmatvenānuśīlitavantaḥ katham aṇu-caitanyaṃ sucirojjhita-vimarśam ātmatvenānuśīlituṃ prabhaveyur iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:206: tatra saguṇopāsanam ākāravad-viṣayatvāt sukaram apramādaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c12u:207: nirguṇopāsanaṃ tu tattvābhāvād duḥkha-karaṃ sa-pramādaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c12u:213: śrutiś ca - yato vāco nivartante aprāpya manasā saha [TaittU 2.4.1] ity ādyā /
GE07bhg4c12u:214: kūṭasthaṃ mithā-bhūtam api satyavat pratītaṃ jagat kūṭam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c12u:217: acaram avikāram ato dhruvaṃ nityam iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:220: tad idaṃ mandaṃ gati-sāmānyāt iti sūtre brahmaṇo dvairūpya-nirāsāt /
GE07bhg4c12u:221: yathā tad akṣaram adhigamyate iti tasya veda-vedyatva-śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c12u:223: pravṛtti-nimittābhāvena nirguṇasyāpramāṇatvāt taucchyāc ca lakṣyatvaṃ tu na,
GE07bhg4c12u:225: sadaikāvasthasya vastunaḥ kūṭasthatvenābhidhānān na ca jagat kūṭam /
GE07bhg4c12u:232: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya mat-parāḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:235: bhavāmi na cirāt pārtha mayy āveśita-cetasām //7//
GE07bhg4c12u:236: śrīdharaḥ - mad-bhaktānāṃ tu mat-prasādād anāyāsenaiva siddhir bhavatīty āha ye tv iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c12u:237: ye mayi parameśvare sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasya samarpya mat-parā bhūtvā /
GE07bhg4c12u:239: ananyena na vidyate 'nyo bhajanīyo yasmiṃs tenaiva /
GE07bhg4c12u:241: teṣām iti / evaṃ mayy āveśitaṃ ceto yais teṣām /
GE07bhg4c12u:242: mṛtyu-yuktāt saṃsāra-sāgarād ahaṃ samyag uddhartācireṇa bhavāmi //7//
GE07bhg4c12u:243: madhusūdanaḥ - nanu phalaikye kleśālpatvādhikyābhyāsam utkarṣa-nikarṣau syātāṃ,
GE07bhg4c12u:244: tad eva tu nāsti nirguṇa-brahma-vidāṃ hi phalam avidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttyā nirviśeṣa-paramānanda-bodha-brahma-rūpatā /
GE07bhg4c12u:245: saguṇa-brahma-vidāṃ tv adhiṣṭhāna-pramāyā abhāvenāvidyā-nivṛtty-abhāvād aiśvarya-viśeṣaḥ kārya-brahma-loka-gatānāṃ phalam /
GE07bhg4c12u:246: ataḥ phalādhikyārtham āyāsādhikyaṃ na nyūnatām āpādayatīit cet,
GE07bhg4c12u:247_0: na suguṇopāsanayā nirasta-sarva-pratibandhānāṃ vinā gurūpadeśaṃ vinā ca śravaṇa-manana-nididhyāsanādy-āvṛtti-kleśaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:248: sa etasmāj jīva-ghanāt parātparaṃ puriśayaṃ puruṣam
GE07bhg4c12u:249_0: īkṣate iti śruteḥ sa prāpta-hiraṇyagarbhaiśvaryo bhogānta etasmāj jīva-ghanāt sarva-jīva-samaṣṭi-rūpāt
GE07bhg4c12u:249_1: parāc chreṣṭhād dhiraṇyagarbhāt paraṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ ca puriśayaṃ sva-hṛdaya-guhā-niviṣṭaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:249_2: puruṣaṃ pūrṇaṃ pratyag-abhinnam advitīyaṃ paramātmānam īkṣate svayam āvirbhūtena
GE07bhg4c12u:251: tathā ca vināpi prāg-ukta-kleśena saguṇa-brahma-vidām īśvara-prasādena nirguṇa-brahma-vidyā-phala-prāptir itīmam artham āha ye tv iti dvyābhyām /
GE07bhg4c12u:253_0: ye sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya saguṇe vāsudeve samarpya mat-parā ahaṃ bhagavān
GE07bhg4c12u:253_1: vāsudeva eva paraḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ prīti-viṣayo yeṣāṃ te tathā santo 'nanyenaiva yogena
GE07bhg4c12u:253_2: na vidyate māṃ bhagavantaṃ muktvānyad-ālambanaṃ yasya tādṛśenaiva yogena samādhinaikānta-bhakti-yogāpara-nāmnā
GE07bhg4c12u:253_3: māṃ bhagavantaṃ vāsudevaṃ sakala-saundarya-sāra-nidhānam ānanda-ghana-vigrahaṃ dvibhujaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:253_4: caturbhujaṃ vā samasta-jana-mano-mohinīṃ muralīm antimanoharaiḥ saptabhiḥ svarair
GE07bhg4c12u:253_6: vā yathā-darśita-viśva-rūpaṃ vā dhyāyanta upāsate samānākāram avicchinnaṃ citta-vṛtti-pravāhaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:253_7: saṃtanvate samīpa-vartitayā 'sate tisṭhanti vā tesāṃ mayy āveśita-cetasāṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:254_0: mayi yathokta āveśitam ekāgratayā praveśitaṃ ceto yais teṣām ahaṃ satatopāsito bhagavān
GE07bhg4c12u:254_1: mṛtyu-saṃsāra-sāgarām mṛtyu-yukto yaḥ saṃsāro mithyā-jñāna-tat-kārya-prapañcaḥ sa
GE07bhg4c12u:254_2: eva sāgarā iva duruttaras tasmāt samuddhartā samyag anāyasenordhve sarva-bādhāv adhibhūte
GE07bhg4c12u:254_3: śuddhe brahmaṇi dhartā dhārayitā jñānāvaṣṭambha-dānena bhavāmi na cirāt kṣipram eva
GE07bhg4c12u:256: viśvanāthaḥ --- bhaktānāṃ tu jñānaṃ vinaiva kevalayā bhaktyaiva sukhena saṃsārān muktir ity āha ye tv iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:257: mayi yat prānty arthaṃ saṃnyasya tyaktvā saṃnyāsa-śabdasya tyāgārthatvāt /
GE07bhg4c12u:258: ananyenaiva jñāna-karma-tapasyādi-rahitenaiva yogena bhakti-yogena yad uktaṃ yat karmabhir yat tapasā jñāna-vairāgyataś ca yat [BhP 11.20.32] ity anantaram /
GE07bhg4c12u:260: svargāpavargaṃ mad-dhāma kathañcid yadi vāñchati // [BhP 11.20.33] iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:261: nanu tad api teṣāṃ saṃsāra-taraṇe kaḥ prakāra iti cet ? satyaṃ /
GE07bhg4c12u:263: yatas tat-prakāraṃ vinaivāham eva tāṃs tārayiṣyāmīty āha teṣām iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:264: tena bhagavato bhakteṣv eva vātsalyaṃ na tu jñāniṣv iti dhvaniḥ //6-7//
GE07bhg4c12u:265: baladevaḥ - tathātma-yāthātmyaṃ śrutvaivātmāṃśino mama kevalāṃ bhaktiṃ ye kurvanti,
GE07bhg4c12u:267: teṣāṃ tu kevalayā mad-bhaktyaiva mat-prāptir acireṇaiva syād ity āha ye tv iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c12u:268_0: ye mad-ekāntino mayi mat-prāpty-arthaṃ sarvāṇi sva-vihitāny api karmāṇi saṃnyasya
GE07bhg4c12u:268_2: kevalena mac-chravaṇādi-lakṣaṇena yogenopāyena māṃ kṛṣṇam upāsate /
GE07bhg4c12u:269: tal-lakṣaṇāṃ mad-upāsanāṃ kurvanti dhyāyantaḥ śravaṇādi-kāle 'pi man-niviṣṭa-manasaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:270: teṣāṃ mayy āveśita-cetasāṃ mad-ekānurakta-manasāṃ bhaktānām aham eva mṛtyu-yuktāt saṃsārāt sāgaravad dustarāt samuddhartā bhavāmi /
GE07bhg4c12u:271: na cirāt tvarayā tat-prāpti-vilambāsahamānas tān ahaṃ garuḍa-skandham āropya sva-dhāma
GE07bhg4c12u:273: nayāmi paramaṃ sthānam arcir ādi-gatiṃ vinā /
GE07bhg4c12u:278: tayā vinā tad āpnoti naro nārāyaṇāśrayaḥ //
GE07bhg4c12u:281: sukhena yāṃ gatiṃ yānti na tāṃ sarve 'pi dhārmikāḥ //
GE07bhg4c12u:285: mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya /
GE07bhg4c12u:286: nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ //8//
GE07bhg4c12u:287: śrīdharaḥ - yasmād evaṃ tasmāt mayy eveti /
GE07bhg4c12u:288: mayy eva saṅkalpa-vikalpātmakaṃ mana ādhatsva sthirīkuru /
GE07bhg4c12u:289: buddhim api vyavasāyātmikāṃ mayy eva niveśaya /
GE07bhg4c12u:290: evaṃ kurvan mat-prasādena labdha-jñānaḥ san ata ata ūrdhvaṃ dehānte mayy eva nivasiṣyasi nivatsyasi /
GE07bhg4c12u:293: yathā ca śrutiḥ dehānte devaḥ paraṃ brahmā tārakaṃ vyacaṣṭe iti //8//
GE07bhg4c12u:294: madhusūdanaḥ - tad evam iyatā prabandhena saguṇopāsanāṃ stutvedānīṃ vidhatte mayy eveti /
GE07bhg4c12u:295: mayy eva saguṇe brahmaṇi manaḥ saṅkalpa-vikalpātmakam ādhatsva sthāpaya sarvā manovṛttīr mad-viṣayā eva kuru /
GE07bhg4c12u:296: eva-kārānuṣaṅgena mayy eva buddhim adhyavasāya-lakṣaṇāṃ niveśaya /
GE07bhg4c12u:299: tataḥ kiṃ syād ity ata āha nivasiṣyasi nivatsyasi labdha-jñānaḥ san mad-ātmanā mayy eva śuddha ata ūrdhvam etad-dehānte na saṃśayo nātra pratibandha-śaṅkā kartavyety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:300: eva ata ūrdhvam ity atra sandhy-abhāvaḥ śloka-pūraṇārthaḥ //8//
GE07bhg4c12u:301: viśvanāthaḥ --- yasmān mad-bhaktir eva śreṣṭhā tasmāt tvaṃ bhaktim eva kurv iti tām upadiśati mayy eveti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:303: mayi śyāmasundare pītāmbare vanamālini mana ādhatsva mat-smaraṇaṃ kurv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:304: tathā buddhiṃ vivekavatīṃ niveśaya man-mananaṃ kurv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:306: tataś ca mayy eva nivasiṣyasīti chāndasam /
GE07bhg4c12u:308: baladevaḥ -- yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tvaṃ mayy eva na tu svātmani mana ādhatsva samāhitaṃ kuru /
GE07bhg4c12u:310: evaṃ kurvāṇas tvaṃ mayy eva mama kṛṣṇasya sannidhāv eva nivatsyasi,
GE07bhg4c12u:311: na tu sa-niṣṭhavat sargādikam anubhavann aiśvarya-pradhānaṃ māṃ prāpsyasīty arthaḥ //8//
GE07bhg4c12u:314: atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram /
GE07bhg4c12u:316: śrīdharaḥ - atrāśaktaṃ prati sugamopāyam āha atheti /
GE07bhg4c12u:317_0: sthiraṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ mayi cittaṃ dhārayituṃ yadi śakto na bhavasi tarhi vikṣiptaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:317_1: cittaṃ punaḥ punaḥ pratyāhṛtya mad-anusmaraṇa-lakṣaṇo yo 'bhyāsa-yogas tena māṃ prāptum iccha /
GE07bhg4c12u:319_0: madhusūdanaḥ - idānīṃ saguṇa-brahma-dhyānāśaktānām aśakti-tāratāmyena prathamaṃ pratimādau
GE07bhg4c12u:319_1: bāhye bhagavad-dhyānābhyāsas tad-aśaktau bhāgavata-dharmānuṣṭhānaṃ tad-aśaktau sarva-karma-phala-tyāga
GE07bhg4c12u:319_2: iti trīṇi sādhanāni tribhiḥ ślokair vidhatte atheti /
GE07bhg4c12u:320_0: atha pakṣāntare sthiraṃ yathā syāt tathā cittaṃ samādhātuṃ sthāpayituṃ mayi na śaknoṣi
GE07bhg4c12u:320_1: cet tata ekasmin pratimādāv ālambane sarvataḥ samāhṛtya cetasaḥ punaḥ punaḥ sthāpanam
GE07bhg4c12u:320_2: abhyāsas tat-pūrvako yogaḥ samādhis tenābhyāsa-yogena mām āptum iccha yatasva /
GE07bhg4c12u:322: bahūn śatrūn jitvā dhanam āhṛtavān asi rājasūyādy-artham ekaṃ manaḥ-śatruṃ jitvā tatva-jñāna-dhanam āhariṣyasīti na tavāścaryam iti sambodhanārthaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c12u:323: viśvanāthaḥ --- sākṣāt smaraṇāsamarthaṃ prati tat-prāpty-upāyam āha atheti /
GE07bhg4c12u:324: abhyāsa-yogenānyatrānyatra gatam api manaḥ punaḥ pratyāhṛtya mad-rūpa eva sthāpanam abhyāsaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:326: prākṛtatvād iti kutsita-rūpa-rasādiṣu calantyā manonadyās teṣu calanaṃ nirudhya atisubhadreṣu madīya-rūpa-rasādiṣu tac-calanaṃ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ sampādayety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:327: he dhanañjayeti bahūn śatrūn jitvā dhanam āhṛtavatā tvayā mano 'pi jitvā dhyāna-dhanaṃ grahītuṃ śakyam eveti bhāvaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c12u:328: baladevaḥ - nanu gaṅgeva yeṣāṃ mano-vṛtti-rodhavatī teṣāṃ tvat-prāptis tvarayā syān mama tu tādṛśī na tad-vṛttis tataḥ kathaṃ seti cet tatrāha atheti /
GE07bhg4c12u:329: sthiraṃ yathā syāt tathā mayi cittaṃ samyag anāyāsenādhātum arpayituṃ na śaknoṣi cet tato 'bhyāsa-yogena mām āptum iccha yatasva /
GE07bhg4c12u:330: tato 'nyatra gatasya manasaḥ pratyāhṛtya śanaiḥ śanair mayi sthāpanam abhyāsas tena manasi mat-pravaṇe sati mat-prāptiḥ sulabhā syād iti bhāvaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c12u:334: mad-artham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi //10//
GE07bhg4c12u:335: śrīdharaḥ - yadi punar naivaṃ tatrāha abhyāsa iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:336: yadi punar abhyāse 'py aśakto 'si tarhi mat-prīty-arthāni yāni karmāṇi ekādaśy-upavāsa-vrata-caryā-pūjā-nāma-saṅkīrtanādīni tad-anuṣṭhānam eva paramaṃ yasya tādṛśo bhava /
GE07bhg4c12u:337: evaṃ-bhūtāni karmāṇy api mad-arthaṃ kurvan mokṣaṃ prāpsyasi //10//
GE07bhg4c12u:338: madhusūdanaḥ - mat-prīṇanārthaṃ karma mat-karma śravaṇa-kīrtanādi-bhāgavata-dharmas tat-paramas tad-eka-niṣṭho bhava /
GE07bhg4c12u:339: abhyāsāsamarthye mad-arthaṃ bhāgavata-dharma-saṃjñakāni karmāṇy api kurvan siddhiṃ brahma-bhāva-lakṣaṇāṃ sattva-śuddhi-jñānotpatti-dvāreṇāvāpsyasi //10//
GE07bhg4c12u:340: viśvanāthaḥ --- abhyāse 'pīti yathā pitta-dūṣitā rasanā matsyaṇḍikāṃ necchati /
GE07bhg4c12u:341: tathaivāvidyā-dūṣitaṃ manas tad-rūpādikaṃ madhuram api na gṛhṇātīty atas tena durgraheṇa mahā-prabalena manasā saha yoddhuṃ mayā naiva śakyata iti manyase ced iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:343_1: kurvan vināpi mat-smaraṇaṃ siddhiṃ premavat-pārṣadatva-lakṣaṇāṃ prāpsyatīti //10 //
GE07bhg4c12u:344: baladevaḥ - nanu vāyor iva manaso 'ticāpalyāt tasya pratyāhāre mama na śaktir iti cet tatrāha abhyāse 'pīti /
GE07bhg4c12u:345: ukta-lakṣaṇe 'bhyāse 'pi cet tvam asamarthas tarhi mat-karmāṇi paramāṇi pumartha-bhūtāni yasya tādṛśo bhava /
GE07bhg4c12u:347_0: evaṃ sukarāṇi mad-arthāni karmāṇi kurvāṇas tvaṃ tatra tarāti-manojña-man-mūrty-uddeśa-mahimnā
GE07bhg4c12u:347_1: tādṛśe mayi nirata-manāḥ saṃsiddhiṃ mat-sāmīpya-lakṣaṇām avāpsyasīty atisugamo 'yam upāyaḥ //10 //
GE07bhg4c12u:350: athaitad apy aśakto 'si kartuṃ mad-yogam āśritaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:352: śrīdharaḥ - atyantaṃ bhagavad-dharma-pariniṣṭhāyām aśaktasya pakṣāntaram āha atheti /
GE07bhg4c12u:353_0: yady etad api kartuṃ na śaknoṣi tarhi mad-ayogaṃ mad-eka-śaraṇatvam āśritaḥ san sarveṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:353_1: dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthānām āvaśyakānāṃ cāgnihotrādi-karmaṇāṃ phalāni niyata-cittaṃ bhūs tvā parityaja /
GE07bhg4c12u:354: etad uktaṃ bhavati mayā tāvad īśvarājñayā yathā-śakti karmāṇi kartavyāni /
GE07bhg4c12u:355: phalaṃ tāvad dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭaṃ vā parameśvarādhīnam ity evaṃ mayi bhāram āropya phalāsaktiṃ parityajya vartamāno mat-prasādena kṛtārtho bhaviṣyasīti //11//
GE07bhg4c12u:356: madhusūdanaḥ - atha bahir-viṣayākṛṣṭa-cetastvād etan-mat-karma-paratvam api kartuṃ na śaknoṣi,
GE07bhg4c12u:357_0: tato mad-yogaṃ mad-eka-śaraṇatvam āśrito mayi sarva-karma-samarpaṇaṃ mad-yogas taṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:357_1: vāśritaḥ san yatātmavān yataḥ saṃyata-sarvendriya ātmavān vivekī ca san sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:358: viśvanāthaḥ --- etad api kartum aśaktaś cet tarhi mad-yogam āśrito mayi sarva-karma-samarpaṇam /
GE07bhg4c12u:359: mad-yogas tam āśritaḥ san sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaṃ prathama-ṣaṭkoktaṃ kuru /
GE07bhg4c12u:360: ayam arthaḥ -- prathama-ṣaṭke bhagavad-arpita-niṣkāma-karma-yoga eva mokṣopāya uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:365: mananātmakaś cākhaṇḍa-smaraṇāsāmarthye tad-anurāgināṃ tad-abhyāsa-rūpaṃ ceti trika evāyaṃ manda-dhiyāṃ durgamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:367: dvitīyaḥ śravaṇa-kīrtanātmakaṃ tu sarveṣāṃ sugama evopāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:370: etat-kṛtya-samarthā indriyāṇāṃ bhagavan-niṣṭhīkṛtāv aśraddhālavaś ca bhagavad-arpita-niṣkāma-karmiṇaḥ prathama-ṣaṭkotādhikāriṇo 'smān nikṛṣṭā eveti //11//
GE07bhg4c12u:371_0: baladevaḥ - atha mahākulīnatva-loka-mukhyatvādinā pratibandhena bādhitas tvam anyo
GE07bhg4c12u:371_1: vai tan-man-niketa-vimārjanādi-mat-prītikara-mati-sukaram api karma cet kartum aśakto
GE07bhg4c12u:371_2: 'si tato mad-yogaṃ mac-charaṇatām āśritaḥ san sarveṣām anuṣṭhīyamānānāṃ karmaṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c12u:372_2: 'bhyudite sva-śeṣiṇi sarvottamatvena vidite śanaiḥ śanaiḥ parāpi bhaktiḥ syād iti /

GE07bhg4c12u:635: nanu śarīra-yātrā-nirvāhāya vāg-vyāpāro 'pekṣita eva nety āha saṃtuṣṭo nivṛtta-spṛhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:637: sthirā paramārtha-vastu-viṣayā matir yasya sa sthira-matiḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:638: īdṛśo yo bhaktimān sa me priyo naraḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:639: atra punaḥ punar bhakter upādānaṃ bhaktir evāpavargasya puṣkalaṃ kāraṇam iti draḍhayitum //19//
GE07bhg4c12u:643: tulyeti nindayā duḥkhaṃ stutyā sukhaṃ ca yo na vindati /
GE07bhg4c12u:645: yena kenacid adṛṣṭākṛṣṭena rukṣeṇa snigdhena vānnādinā santuṣṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:648: eṣv adveṣṭety ādiṣu saptasu yeṣu guṇānāṃ punar apy abhidhānaṃ tat teṣām atidaurlabhya-jñāpanārtham ity adoṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:649: san-niṣṭhādīnāṃ tri-vidhānāṃ bhaktānāṃ sambhūya sthitā ete 'dveṣṭṛtvādayo dharmā yathā-sambhava-tāratamyenaiva sudhībhiḥ saṅgamanīyāḥ //18-19//
GE07bhg4c12u:652: ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate /
GE07bhg4c12u:653: śraddadhānā mat-paramā bhaktās te 'tīva me priyāḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c12u:654: śrīdharaḥ : uktaṃ dharma-jātaṃ sapahalam upasaṃharati ye tv iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:668: adveṣṭety ādinākṣaropāsakādīnāṃ jīvanmuktānāṃ saṃnyāsināṃ lakṣaṇa-bhūtaṃ svabhāva-siddhaṃ dharma-jāta-muktam /
GE07bhg4c12u:671: ayatnato bhavanty eva na tu sādhana-rūpiṇaḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:673: tad idaṃ dharma-jātaṃ prayatnena sampādyamānaṃ mumukṣor mokṣa-sādhanaṃ bhavatīti pratipādayann upasaṃharati ye tv iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:674_0: ye tu saṃnyāsino mumukṣavo dharmāmṛtaṃ dharma-rūpam amṛta-sādhanatvād amṛtavad āsvādyatvād
GE07bhg4c12u:674_1: vedaṃ yathoktam adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānām ity ādinā pratipāditaṃ paryupāsate 'nutiṣṭhanti
GE07bhg4c12u:674_2: prayatnena śraddadhānāḥ santo mat-paramā ahaṃ bhagavān akṣarātmā vāsudeva eva paramaḥ
GE07bhg4c12u:674_3: prāptavyo niratiśayā gatir yeṣāṃ te mat-paramā bhaktā māṃ nirupādhikaṃ brahma bhajamānās
GE07bhg4c12u:675: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ iti pūrva-sūcitasyāyam upasaṃhāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:676_0: yasmād dharmāmṛtam idaṃ śraddhayānutiṣṭhan bhagavato viṣṇoḥ parameśvarasyātīva priyo
GE07bhg4c12u:676_1: bhavati tasmād idaṃ jñānavataḥ svabhāva-siddhatayā lakṣaṇam api mumukṣuṇātma-tattva-jijñāsunātma-jñānopāyatvena
GE07bhg4c12u:676_2: yatnād anuṣṭheyaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ jigamiṣuṇeti vākyārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:682: uktavān bahuvidha-svabhakta-niṣṭhān dharmān upasaṃharan kārtsnyenaital-lipsūnāṃ tac-chravaṇa-vicāraṇādi-phalam āha ye tv iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:683: ete bhakty-uttha-śānty-uttha-dharmā na prākṛtā guṇāḥ bhaktyā tuṣyati kṛṣṇo na guṇaiḥ ity ukta-koṭitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:685: ete tu tat-tat-sarva-sal-lakṣaṇepsavaḥ sādhakā api tebhyaḥ siddhebhyo 'pi śreṣṭhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c12u:693: baladevaḥ : ukta-bhakti-yogam upasaṃharan tasmin niṣṭhā-phalam āha ye tv iti /
GE07bhg4c12u:694: ye bhaktā yathoktaṃ mayy āveśya mano ye mām ity ādibhir yathā-gatam idaṃ dharmāmṛtaṃ paryupāsate /
GE07bhg4c12u:695: prāpyaṃ mām iva prāpakaṃ tat samāśrayanti /
GE07bhg4c12u:696: śraddadhānā bhakti-śraddhā-lavo mat-paramā man-niratās te mamātīva priyā bhavanti //20//
GE07bhg4c12u:697: vaśaḥ svaika-juṣāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sva-bhakty-eka-juṣāṃ tu saḥ /
